caption:
Table 3. Number of IDs and number of images/ID should both be 
high to learn diverse and robust embedding. Mixing two datasets 
with large/small number of images/ID can be an efficient way of 
satisfying both. The overall accuracy becomes higher than relying 
on one of the two datasets.

faces & using a small number of real faces -we significantly outperform SynFace across all datasets. Avg  ? shows average of LFW, CFP-FP
